item.description:
Join us for what, I believe, is the best Fashion Industry Meetup in the world. We welcome members from all over the world, stopping in to a Boston meetup. We have members who are very experienced in different aspects of the industry, and many who are beginners looking to find help from you.

We also have fun, great networking time, and projects to get involved in. I look forward to seeing familar faces and new members at the next Meetup. Make sure you join our Network Database http://www.bostonfash...
so that others can network with you in an organized way.

MBTA directions to Positive Image, 135 Mass Ave.
Its advisable for everyone to park their cars at a convenient MBTA station and take the train to Park Street Station. Get on the Green Line heading outbound, any train, B,C,D, except NOT E. Get off at Hynes Center. Go up stairs to Mass Ave. Take a left to lights and cross Boylston Street to Berkeley School of Music; then immediately cross Mass Ave. and you will see 135 Mass Ave. Ring bell for 3rd. Floor. Positive Image photo studio. And take elevator to 3rd. Floor.

For more information on your Organizer, see my web site, ShirleyWillet.com

Shirley, Organizer
item.name: The Boston Fashion Industry November Meetup
